alert.note: Alert for Avoyelles; Evangeline; Rapides (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 4:44PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Rapides, northeastern Evangeline and west central Avoyelles Parishes through 515 PM CDT... At 441 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Turkey Creek, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and small hail will be possible.. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects and small hail. Locations impacted include... Bunkie, Cheneyville, Turkey Creek, Lecompte, Echo, Poland, Woodworth and Forest Hill. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 51 and 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
